en.goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
en.indicator_name: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
en.target_name: By 2030, significantly reduce the number of deaths and the number of people affected and substantially decrease the direct economic losses relative to global gross domestic product caused by disasters, including water-related disasters, with a focus on protecting the poor and people in vulnerable situations
en.un_designated_tier: Tier I
en.un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction (UNDRR)
en.page_content:
In progress
A suitable data source has been identified. The corresponding time series are currently being processed to be included in this reporting platform.
